name: Ruchi Bbq Chanachur
description:
Ruchi BBQ Chanachur is a savory, crunchy, and flavorful snack mix, perfect for those who love the taste of BBQ spices. Made with a combination of crispy chickpeas, fried lentils, peanuts, and various other ingredients, this chanachur is infused with a smoky BBQ flavor. It’s a popular choice for snacking, offering a great balance of crunchiness and spiciness. Ingredients: Chickpeas, Fried Lentils, Peanuts, Rice Flakes, Oil, SaltBBQ Seasoning (which may include spices like paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, sugar, and other flavor enhancers). Making Process:Preparation: The main ingredients like chickpeas, lentils, and peanuts are fried to crispiness.Flavoring: The BBQ seasoning mix is made by blending various spices to create the smoky and tangy BBQ flavor.Mixing: The fried ingredients are combined with the BBQ seasoning mix to ensure each bite is packed with flavor.Packaging: The final mix is sealed in airtight packaging to preserve its crunch and flavor. Uses:Snacking: Enjoy on its own as a crispy and flavorful snack anytime.Side Dish: Serve as a side snack with drinks or as part of a party platter.Topping for Salads or Soups: Sprinkle on salads or soups to add a crunchy texture and flavorful twist.Tiffin Box: A great addition to kids’ lunchboxes for a crunchy treat.
Ruchi BBQ Chanachur is a savory, crunchy, and flavorful snack mix, perfect for those who love the taste of BBQ spices. Made with a combination of crispy chickpeas, fried lentils, peanuts, and various other ingredients, this chanachur is infused with a smoky BBQ flavor. It’s a popular choice for snacking, offering a great balance of crunchiness and spiciness.
 
Ingredients: Chickpeas, Fried Lentils, Peanuts, Rice Flakes, Oil, Salt
BBQ Seasoning (which may include spices like paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, sugar, and other flavor enhancers).
 
Making Process:
Preparation: The main ingredients like chickpeas, lentils, and peanuts are fried to crispiness.
Flavoring: The BBQ seasoning mix is made by blending various spices to create the smoky and tangy BBQ flavor.
Mixing: The fried ingredients are combined with the BBQ seasoning mix to ensure each bite is packed with flavor.
Packaging: The final mix is sealed in airtight packaging to preserve its crunch and flavor.
 
Uses:
Snacking: Enjoy on its own as a crispy and flavorful snack anytime.
Side Dish: Serve as a side snack with drinks or as part of a party platter.
Topping for Salads or Soups: Sprinkle on salads or soups to add a crunchy texture and flavorful twist.
Tiffin Box: A great addition to kids’ lunchboxes for a crunchy treat.

name: Ruchi Bbq Chanachur
description:
RUCHI BBQ Chanachur is the pioneer of barbecue-flavored chanachur in Bangladesh. Its smoky grilled flavor is unique, distinctive and mouthwatering - which helps it retain the top spot at the center of every chat group across all age groups. RUCHI BBQ is crispier, crunchier and smarter - and with it, gossiping and leisure periods can be enjoyed far better.

name: Ruchi Puffed Rice (Muri)
description:
Ruchi Puffed Rice (Muri) is a light and crispy snack made from high-quality rice, puffed to perfection. It is a versatile food item, popular in traditional Bangladeshi and South Asian cuisine. Perfect for quick snacks, it can be enjoyed plain, spiced, or mixed with other ingredients like vegetables, spices, or nuts. Ingredients:Premium-quality riceEdible salt (optional) Specification:Title: Ruchi Muri (200gm)Brand: RuchiNet Weight: 200 gmNumber of Pieces: 1 Pack

name: Ruchi Jhal Chanachur
description:
Ruchi Jhal Chanachur is a spicy, crispy snack mix that is perfect for those who enjoy a bold, fiery kick. Made with a combination of fried chickpeas, lentils, peanuts, and crispy rice flakes, this snack is seasoned with a blend of spices to deliver a flavorful heat. It's a popular snack in Bangladesh, ideal for enjoying as a crunchy treat or serving at gatherings. Ingredients: Chickpeas,Fried Lentils,Peanuts,Rice Flakes,Oil,Salt,Chili Powder Other Spices (may include cumin, garlic powder, sugar, and flavor enhancers). Making Process:Preparation: The chickpeas, lentils, and peanuts are fried to a crispy texture.Seasoning: A spicy blend of chili powder and other aromatic spices is prepared to add heat and flavor to the snack mix.Mixing: The fried ingredients are tossed in the spicy seasoning mix, ensuring an even coating for a consistent flavor in every bite.Packaging: The final product is packed in airtight bags to preserve freshness and crunchiness. Uses:Snacking: Enjoy as a spicy, crunchy snack anytime, perfect for satisfying hunger.Tiffin Box: A great addition to kids' or adults' lunchboxes for a spicy treat.Party Snacks: Serve as a snack at parties, gatherings, or casual get-togethers.With Drinks: Pairs wonderfully with cold beverages like soda, tea, or beer.

name: Bombay Sweets Chanachur
description:
Bombay Sweets Chanachur is a popular savory snack mix loved for its bold and spicy flavors. This crunchy mixture contains fried lentils, peanuts, flattened rice, crispy noodles (sev), and a blend of traditional spices. It is a perfect balance of textures and flavors, making it an ideal snack for tea time, parties, or any casual gathering. Key Features:Spicy, tangy, and crunchy snack.Contains a mix of lentils, peanuts, and crispy fried ingredients.Comes in a 150 gm pack, suitable for sharing or individual enjoyment. Storage Instructions:Store in a cool and dry place to maintain its crispiness and freshness. This iconic snack offers the authentic taste of traditional South Asian chanachur, making it a favorite among all age groups​

name: Bombay Sweets Chanachur
description:
Bombay Sweets Chanachur (300 gm) is a flavorful, traditional Indian snack mix that combines various ingredients, creating a savory and spicy treat. It includes chickpea flour, rice flakes, peanuts, lentils, and split chickpeas, all fried and seasoned with spices like red chili powder, turmeric, and salt. This namkeen is widely loved for its crunchy texture and bold, tangy taste, making it a popular snack choice. The product is available in different sizes, with the 300 gm pack being ideal for larger gatherings or long-lasting enjoyment

name: Ruchi Premium Mix Chanachur
description:
Premium Chanachur is a new concept for the RUCHI snacks basket - and has been concocted with exciting ingredients in a unique flavor combination. RUCHI Premium Chanachur is enriched with Almonds, Raisin, Whole Lentil, and Chickpeas, and comes in a unique Paprika Flavor. While the crispness of regular chanachur ingredients will be enhanced by Whole Lentil & Chickpea, on the other hand, the sweetness of Raisin and the great taste of Almond will give the real excitement of snacks. To place the product as a perfect combination of Hot, Sour & Sweet, RUCHI Premium Mix is carving its niche in the snacks basket across Bangladesh.

name: Bombay Sweets Dalmoth Namkeen
description:
Bombay Sweets Dalmoth Namkeen is a traditional savory snack made with a combination of fried lentils, chickpea flour noodles (sev), peanuts, and a blend of spices. It delivers a perfect mix of crunch and bold flavors with a tangy and spicy kick. This snack is widely enjoyed for its classic South Asian taste and is perfect for tea-time, parties, or quick hunger fixes. Key Features:A mix of lentils and crispy sev for a crunchy texture.Infused with traditional spices for a tangy and spicy flavor.Packed in a 150 gm bag, suitable for sharing or individual consumption. Storage Instructions:Store in a cool, dry place to maintain freshness and crunchiness. Enjoy this delicious snack as a standalone treat or pair it with a hot beverage for an authentic experience.

name: Bombay Sweets Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur
description:
Introducing the tantalizing and fiery delight, Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur! This delectable snack is crafted to awaken your taste buds with its irresistible combination of bold flavors and spicy heat. Each 150 gm pack is a treasure trove of crispy, crunchy bites that will keep you coming back for more. Bursting with a harmonious blend of traditional Indian spices, this savory mix features the legendary Naga chili, renowned for its intense spiciness and distinctive flavor profile. As you open the pack, the aromatic spices fill the air, whetting your appetite for the snacking adventure that awaits. The meticulously selected ingredients, including roasted peanuts, chickpea noodles, lentils, and puffed rice, create a satisfying texture that provides a satisfying crunch with every bite. The star of the show, the Naga chili, brings a fiery kick that lingers on the palate, giving you an exhilarating taste experience. But fear not! Amidst the heat, you'll discover a delightful balance of tangy and savory notes, ensuring a multidimensional taste sensation that keeps you hooked. Whether you're hosting a gathering with friends, enjoying a movie night, or simply seeking a spicy snack to accompany your evening tea, Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur is a perfect choice. Its vibrant flavors and addictive crunch make it an ideal companion for any occasion. Indulge in this zesty and bold treat that combines tradition, innovation, and the captivating heat of the Naga chili. Let Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur transport your taste buds on a flavorful journey you won't soon forget!

name: Bombay Sweets Chanachur Bombay Mix
description:
Bombay Sweets Chanachur Bombay Mix 300 gm is a popular and traditional snack in Bangladesh, offering a flavorful blend of crispy, savory, and mildly spicy ingredients. This 300g pack is perfect for casual snacking or pairing with drinks at parties. The mix typically includes chickpea flour, peanuts, rice flakes, vegetable oil, spices, and salt, with a combination of tangy and spicy flavors that are typical of Bengali snacks.

name: Bombay Sweets Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur
description:
Introducing the tantalizing and fiery delight, of Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur! This delectable snack is crafted to awaken your taste buds with its irresistible combination of bold flavors and spicy heat. Each 300gm pack is a treasure trove of crispy, crunchy bites that will keep you coming back for more. Bursting with a harmonious blend of traditional Indian spices, this savory mix features the legendary Naga chili, renowned for its intense spiciness and distinctive flavor profile. As you open the pack, the aromatic spices fill the air, whetting your appetite for the snacking adventure that awaits. The meticulously selected ingredients, including roasted peanuts, chickpea noodles, lentils, and puffed rice, create a satisfying texture that provides a satisfying crunch with every bite. The star of the show, the Naga chili, brings a fiery kick that lingers on the palate, giving you an exhilarating taste experience. But fear not! Amidst the heat, you'll discover a delightful balance of tangy and savory notes, ensuring a multidimensional taste sensation that keeps you hooked. Whether you're hosting a gathering with friends, enjoying a movie night, or simply seeking a spicy snack to accompany your evening tea, Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur is the perfect choice. Its vibrant flavors and addictive crunch make it an ideal companion for any occasion. Indulge in this zesty and bold treat that combines tradition, innovation, and the captivating heat of the Naga chili. Let Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur transport your taste buds on a flavorful journey you won't soon forget!
Introducing the tantalizing and fiery delight, of Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur! This delectable snack is crafted to awaken your taste buds with its irresistible combination of bold flavors and spicy heat.
 
Each 300gm pack is a treasure trove of crispy, crunchy bites that will keep you coming back for more. Bursting with a harmonious blend of traditional Indian spices, this savory mix features the legendary Naga chili, renowned for its intense spiciness and distinctive flavor profile.
 
As you open the pack, the aromatic spices fill the air, whetting your appetite for the snacking adventure that awaits. The meticulously selected ingredients, including roasted peanuts, chickpea noodles, lentils, and puffed rice, create a satisfying texture that provides a satisfying crunch with every bite.
 
The star of the show, the Naga chili, brings a fiery kick that lingers on the palate, giving you an exhilarating taste experience. But fear not! Amidst the heat, you'll discover a delightful balance of tangy and savory notes, ensuring a multidimensional taste sensation that keeps you hooked.
 
Whether you're hosting a gathering with friends, enjoying a movie night, or simply seeking a spicy snack to accompany your evening tea, Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur is the perfect choice. Its vibrant flavors and addictive crunch make it an ideal companion for any occasion.
 
Indulge in this zesty and bold treat that combines tradition, innovation, and the captivating heat of the Naga chili. Let Bombay Naga Jhal Chanachur transport your taste buds on a flavorful journey you won't soon forget!

name: BD Food Bar-B-Q Chanachur
description:
Introducing BD Food Bar-B-Q Chanachur, a delectable snack that perfectly captures the smoky and savory essence of barbecue flavors. Enclosed within a convenient 280 gm package, this snack offers a harmonious blend of textures and tastes that's sure to tantalize your taste buds. BD Food Bar-B-Q Chanachur is a culinary delight meticulously crafted to satisfy your cravings for bold and savory flavors. The mix features a medley of crispy components such as lentil fritters, nuts, and crunchy elements, all coated in a rich barbecue seasoning that imparts a distinctive smokiness and robust taste.With its inviting aroma and satisfying crunch, this Chanachur becomes an ideal companion for your snacking moments.

name: BD Food Fried Peas (Motor Bhaja) 50 gm
description:
Introducing BD Food Fried Peas (Motor Bhaja), a delightful snack that encapsulates the authentic flavors of fried peas, popularly known as Motor Bhaja. This unique offering comes in a convenient pack of five 50 gm pouches, each delivering a burst of crispy goodness and savory satisfaction. BD Food Fried Peas (Motor Bhaja) is a culinary delight that pays homage to a beloved traditional snack. The peas are expertly fried to achieve a crispy texture while preserving their natural flavor. This classic preparation results in a snack that captures the essence of local flavors and culinary heritage.

name: Act II Popcorn Movie Theatre Butter
description:
Act II Popcorn Movie Theatre Butter 70g is the perfect snack for movie nights, offering a buttery and rich flavor that mimics the taste of traditional movie theater popcorn. This ready-to-make popcorn is easy to prepare and provides a delicious, satisfying crunch with every bite, making it a great choice for casual snacking or entertaining guests. Ingredients:Popped CornVegetable OilButter FlavoringSaltArtificial Butter FlavourColor Additives (if applicable) Buttery Flavor: Enjoy the authentic movie theater taste with a rich, buttery finish.Quick & Convenient: Pre-packaged for easy preparation in just a few minutes.Crispy & Crunchy: The popcorn delivers a satisfying, crunchy texture for snacking enjoyment.Perfect for Movie Time: A classic snack for movie lovers or anyone seeking a flavorful treat.

name: Amore Peanut Chocolate Wafer Roll
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in China and its raw materials are collected from China. Tong Garden ranks at the top in Southeast Asian markets when it comes to nuts products and snacks. Tong Garden grew into one of Asia’s greatest nut giants. Tong Garden never compromise on quality, and Tong Garden is constantly innovating to bring consumers more great-tasting snacks. Cashew nuts, broad beans, broad beans, pistachios, almonds, macadamias, sunflower kernels, honey-coated nut, Wasabi Cashew Nuts Mixed Macadamias, and most recently Almonds with Dried Cranberries and Banana Chips are the product range of Tong Garden. New products, new processes, aggressive strategies and creative use of R&D produced triple digit growth in sales between 1996 and today for Tong Garden. Fair Food & Life Style is the official distributor of Tong Garden in Bangladesh. Tong Garden has got much popularity as premium snacks for Bangladeshi with FFL.

name: Bombay Sweets Jhal Muri
description:
Bombay Sweets Jhal Muri (17 gm) is a popular snack made with puffed rice, spices, and various savory ingredients, offering a tangy, spicy, and crunchy flavor. This snack is commonly enjoyed for its quick energy boost and is a traditional favorite in many South Asian households. It is known for its light texture and spicy seasoning, making it a convenient and tasty option for on-the-go snacking​.

name: Bombay Sweets Chanachur Tandoori
description:
Bombay Sweets Chanachur Tandoori 150 gm offers a flavorful snack inspired by the traditional tandoori cooking style, often used for royal dishes. The product combines chickpea flour, rice flakes, peanuts, and various spices to deliver a unique and rich taste. This variant is designed to bring the bold and smoky flavors of tandoori cooking into a convenient snack form. It is available in multiple sizes, including 150 gm, and is a perfect choice for spicy, savory treats​. Features:1. Product Type: Chanachur2. Brand: Bombay Sweets3. Net Weight:150gm4. No harmful chemicals added.5. Ingredients: Flour, oil, Spices6. Food value: Fat, Fiber, Carbs

name: Bombay Sweets Chanachur Tandoori
description:
Discover the enticing flavors of Bombay Sweets Chanachur Tandoori in a generous 300g pack. Immerse yourself in the zesty charm of this traditional Indian snack, expertly spiced to deliver an unforgettable taste experience. Handcrafted to perfection, this Chanachur Tandoori blend combines a variety of crunchy ingredients, including fried lentils, nuts, and savory tidbits. The tandoori infusion adds a touch of smoky warmth, enhancing the overall profile with its aromatic notes. With every bite, you'll relish the perfect balance of textures and flavors, from the crispy crunch to the tantalizing spiciness. Whether enjoyed during tea time, shared at gatherings, or simply as a quick pick-me-up, Bombay Sweets Chanachur Tandoori adds a dash of authentic Indian flavors to your snacking moments.

name: Bombay Sweets Dalmoth
description:
Bombay Sweets Dalmoth 300 gm is a savory snack consisting of a blend of green lentils, potato crisps, and special spices, creating a flavorful, crunchy mix. It's a popular choice for a tea-time snack or a light meal. This tasty and nutritious mix is widely enjoyed in Bangladesh.

name: Bombay Sweets BBQ Chanachur
description:
Bombay Sweets BBQ Chanachur (150 gm) is a savory snack that combines the flavors of chickpea flour, rice flakes, peanuts, lentils, split chickpeas, and spices. This BBQ-flavored variant is designed to provide a smoky, trendy taste that's both unique and popular for its rich, bold flavor profile. The snack includes ingredients such as red chili powder, onion powder, salt, citric acid, and natural flavors to create a crunchy, spicy treat ideal for munching. It's available in both 35g and 150g pack sizes, catering to both individual and larger consumption needs.

name: Haldiram Elaichi Soan Papdi
description:
Haldiram Elaichi Soan Papdi 200g Details:Haldiram Elaichi Soan Papdi is a popular Indian sweet made from a delicate blend of flour, sugar, and ghee, flavored with elaichi (cardamom). Known for its light, flaky texture, and aromatic flavor, Soan Papdi is a beloved treat in Indian households and is often served during festivals, celebrations, and special occasions. The addition of elaichi gives it a distinctive, aromatic sweetness. Haldiram’s version is a premium-quality offering, ensuring consistency and flavor with every bite. WeightEach pack contains 200 grams of Soan Papdi, which is a standard size for sharing or personal consumption. Ingredients  The main ingredients typically include:  Sugar Wheat FlourGhee (Clarified Butter)  Cardamom (Elaichi)CornflourMilk SolidsEdible Colors (optional)  Cashews (optional, for garnishing) Uses: Dessert: Serve as a sweet treat after meals or during festivals like Diwali, Holi, or Eid.  Gifts: Often gifted to relatives and friends during festive occasions or celebrations.  Snack: Perfect for munching on throughout the day as a light snack with tea or coffee.  Special Occasions: Ideal for weddings, birthdays, or housewarming parties.  Pairing: Pairs well with hot beverages like chai or lassi.
Haldiram Elaichi Soan Papdi 200g

Cashews (optional, for garnishing)
 
Uses: 
Dessert: Serve as a sweet treat after meals or during festivals like Diwali, Holi, or Eid.  
Gifts: Often gifted to relatives and friends during festive occasions or celebrations.  
Snack: Perfect for munching on throughout the day as a light snack with tea or coffee.  
Special Occasions: Ideal for weddings, birthdays, or housewarming parties.  
Pairing: Pairs well with hot beverages like chai or lassi.
